faq.question: How does Voice AI work for Richmond businesses?
faq.answer: Our AI voice agents answer your business calls just like a trained receptionist. They can answer questions about your Richmond services, qualify leads based on your criteria, book appointments into your calendar, and route urgent calls to you. The AI works 24/7, never takes breaks, and handles multiple calls simultaneously during busy periods.

faq.question: What types of Richmond businesses benefit from Voice AI?
faq.answer: Service businesses across Richmond see the biggest impact—HVAC companies, law firms, medical practices, home services (plumbing, electrical, roofing), real estate agents, and any Richmond business that gets phone leads. If you're missing calls or spending too much time on unqualified leads, Voice AI is perfect for you.

faq.question: How much does Voice AI cost for Richmond businesses?
faq.answer: Our packages start at $97/month, which includes setup, training, and 50 AI phone calls. Most Richmond businesses see positive ROI within the first 30 days by capturing leads they would have otherwise missed. We also offer growth packages with unlimited calls for high-volume businesses.

faq.question: Can the AI handle Richmond-specific questions?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We train your AI with Richmond-specific information—your service areas, local expertise, pricing for the Richmond market, and common questions from Richmond customers. The AI can even reference local landmarks and neighborhoods to build rapport with callers.

faq.answer: If the AI encounters a question it can't answer confidently, it will capture the caller's information and either transfer the call to you immediately (if you're available) or schedule a callback at a convenient time. You never lose a lead.
